content.prompt: The 1968 Tet Offensive was significant because it

choices.label: showed that American soldiers were ill equipped to fight in the jungle
pressured North Vietnam to come to the bargaining table
convinced President Johnson to begin bombing Cambodia
reaffirmed popular support for the South Vietnamese government
led to increased antiwar sentiment in the United States

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
